tags: made a proper image for this post now
summary: Join the Heart of the Server Discord Server!
body:
diosmaden:

Join the Heart of the Server Discord Server!

Well I was not expecting to post this one tonight LOL I was planning to double check some final setups and added the patreon bot, which promptly automatically added patrons to the server so erm!! i guess it’s real now!

hi hotties! there is now a heart of the storm discord server if that is something that interests you :)

If you purchased the PDF, you can let me know and I’ll give you access to the spoiler channel so you can talk with other people who’ve finished the chapter! See you there maybe!

summary: The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was "draw your characters as realistically as you can," and I...
body:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

reblog.tree_html:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

summary: while im making title jokes actually i said itd be fun to make skies a backronym the other day but then i spent like an entire...
body: while im making title jokes actually i said itd be fun to make skies a backronym the other day but then i spent like an entire day thinking about it and literally anything i could think of i hated because it was just like random words LMFAO… “silver kisses in eternal silence” <- thats literally nothing and about the only coherent thing i could think of. what is that. honestly 5 words is too many words to be in a title i fear. unless its I’m Scheduled To Be Hanged In The Morning And This Blue Demon Woman Is Breaking Me Out Of Jail And I Think I’m In Love?!?? then it’s not nearly enough words and you could put more in there, but anyway unless something comes to me in a beautiful vision i think the backronym idea is not going to happen LOL

reblog.comment: while im making title jokes actually i said itd be fun to make skies a backronym the other day but then i spent like an entire day thinking about it and literally anything i could think of i hated because it was just like random words LMFAO… “silver kisses in eternal silence” <- thats literally nothing and about the only coherent thing i could think of. what is that. honestly 5 words is too many words to be in a title i fear. unless its I’m Scheduled To Be Hanged In The Morning And This Blue Demon Woman Is Breaking Me Out Of Jail And I Think I’m In Love?!?? then it’s not nearly enough words and you could put more in there, but anyway unless something comes to me in a beautiful vision i think the backronym idea is not going to happen LOL

summary: im a blogger at heart and not a microposter so dont expect me to go anywhere any time soon unless it's to my own website (which...
body: im a blogger at heart and not a microposter so dont expect me to go anywhere any time soon unless it’s to my own website (which would not mean leaving tumblr anyway) but seeing as there has been an influx of new users on there lately: you can find me on bsky at @diosmaden.art if you are so inclined!

reblog.comment: im a blogger at heart and not a microposter so dont expect me to go anywhere any time soon unless it’s to my own website (which would not mean leaving tumblr anyway) but seeing as there has been an influx of new users on there lately: you can find me on bsky at @diosmaden.art if you are so inclined!

trail.content_raw: im a blogger at heart and not a microposter so dont expect me to go anywhere any time soon unless it’s to my own website (which would not mean leaving tumblr anyway) but seeing as there has been an influx of new users on there lately: you can find me on bsky at @diosmaden.art if you are so inclined!

summary: logically speaking thistle would not be studying storytelling and performance at the hall of fables with selene its just not her...
body: logically speaking thistle would not be studying storytelling and performance at the hall of fables with selene its just not her thing so i imagine they tried to turn her away and she growled at them and then they turned to selene for reason and she also growled at them

tags: typing out hots and doog next to skies did make me think itd be funny to make the skies placeholder a backronym
summary: whatever the story of skies actually ends up Being bc its still very handwave wiggle atm im thinking it'll be set 3 years after...
body:
whatever the story of skies actually ends up Being bc its still very handwave wiggle atm im thinking it’ll be set 3 years after hots and 3 before doog, which is fun bc it does mean edel would be present.

being the daughter of the master fabler of the hall, edel occupies a social position there where everyone knows who she is and nobody is her friend bc she learnt at a young age that people in the hall only get close to her to try leverage her clout.

& warlon is very coddling which creates endless issues for her bc she can get away with anything but she also can’t leave the hall bc he won’t let her. so the teachers are very harsh on her, bc the master fabler isnt, and she doesn’t have any friends, bc she’s put up walls, n this ultimately is what leads to her running away in doog.. but this is before that.

n i think theres an interesting dynamic to be had between edel who has everything and wants to leave the hall and selene who has nothing and wants nothing more than to be a part of the hall. and both of them are alienated to some degree by the people within it. like maybe edel could get a friend slash rival in selene. n then the ramifications of her leaving… man…
